Reviews.Title: Exceptional service
Reviews.Author: deep thinker
Reviews.Content: Thank you.... Will not find at home depot or lowes.. I needed one more of theses to put a light in my basement. i pulled down and an old light and lost one. went to lowes and home depot with no luck until i found it amazon... thanks a million

Reviews.Title: Did the Job
Reviews.Author: grehobbs
Reviews.Content: THe clips mounted as designed.  The daycare center now has the drapes hung as needed. i dont have 5 more words.

Reviews.Title: Small but stout
Reviews.Author: Chris Smith "cx2smith"
Reviews.Content: I have been looking all over for scissor clamps like these. They are very compact and appear to be designed to hold a decent amount of weight. I was impressed by the apparent strength of the mount.

ProductInfo.Features:
The perfect solution for drop ceiling rails!
T-Bar Clip measures 1.06-Inch x 1.75-Inch (26.9mm x 44.5mm)
0.25-Inch 20 mounting stud
ProductInfo.Name: Panavise T-bar Clip
